title: [K-12] International Competency Development Project for Multicultural Environment Adaptation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic foreign language conversational skills and foundational understanding of international exchange dynamics
context.additional_context: Collaborative project performance by learners from diverse cultural backgrounds to solve real-life problems

learning_goals: Learners can collaborate with multicultural team members to draft a campaign plan reflecting local culture within two weeks.
Learners can analyze three or more conflict scenarios arising during intercultural communication and propose resolution strategies.
Learners can produce presentation materials that reflect the communication conventions of the target culture when presenting project outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
